mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_bank where delete_flag like concat('%',#{deleteFlag},'%') and name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and store like concat('%',#{store},'%') and date_format(deal_date,'%Y-%m-%d') like concat('%',#{dealDate},'%')

select code, name, store, date_format(deal_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as dealDate, phone, fax, post, address, mgr, mgr_phone as mgrPhone, mgr_email as mgrEmail from tb_bank where delete_flag like concat('%',#{vo.deleteFlag},'%') and name like concat('%',#{vo.name },'%') and store like concat('%',#{vo.store },'%') and date_format(deal_date,'%Y-%m-%d') like concat('%',#{vo.dealDate},'%')
limit #{pagination.pageIndex }, #{pagination.listSize }
